name: Get Errata Details
description:
As a Red Hat Subscription Management user
    I can view the details of an erratum via API
    So that I do not have to spend time clicking around the portal
    Erratum by erratum
    To gather the information that is useful to me

elements.name: Get Errata Details
Get Errata Details Invalid ID
Get Errata Details Unauthd
List Errata Packages Invalid ID
List Errata Packages

elements.name: List Errata Packages Pagination

steps.name: the Pagination Count is as Expected

name: Get Subscription Content Sets
description:
As a Red Hat Subscription Management user
    I can request and receive content sets per subscription

elements.name: Subscription List Content Sets

steps.name: I hock and activate an active sku: MCT2883
I request content sets by a subscription number
I should be able to get a list of content sets for my subscription

name: Get System Packages
description:
As a Red Hat Subscription Management user
    I can request and receive my systems package list

elements.name: Get System Package List

steps.name: I have a system with installed packages that contains errata
I request the package list of a system with a "valid" UUID
I should see my expected package list

elements.name: Get System Package List Invalid UUID

steps.name: I have a system with installed packages that contains errata
I request the package list of a system with a "invalid" UUID

elements.name: Get System Package List Errata Details

steps.name: I have a system with installed packages that contains errata
I request the package list of a system with a "valid" UUID with errata details included
I should see my expected package list with Errata Details included

elements.name: Get System Package List No Package Profile

steps.name: I request the package list of a system with a "valid" UUID

elements.name: Get System Package List Up To Date

steps.name: I have a up to date system with installed packages that contains errata
I request the package list of a system with a "valid" UUID
I should see my expected package list for an up to date system

elements.name: Get System Package List Unauthenticated

steps.name: I have a up to date system with installed packages that contains errata
I request the package list of a system with a "valid" UUID

elements.name: Get System Package List Invalid Auth

steps.name: I am a user with an invalid auth
I have a up to date system with installed packages that contains errata
I request the package list of a system with a "valid" UUID

steps.name: I have a system with installed packages that contains errata
